headline: Mississippi Power Chairman, President and CEO Anthony Wilson announces retirement
summary: Mississippi Power Chairman, President and CEO Anthony Wilson announced today that he will be retiring this summer after a career with Mississippi Power and Southern Company that spanned more than four decades.
